text:
When extracting container files (winmail.dat, *.zip) to directories on the filesystem, need a strategy to delete the created directories on JVM exit or earlier.

This is mostly needed for unit testing, but may also be useful to POI-powered applications.
creator: onealj@apache.org
onealj@apache.org
text: Move DefaultTempFileCreationStrategy from TempFile inner class to its own class in r1751185.
